text: Hagi anante nagra hu'na, Ra Anumzamoka hazenke knafima mani'nogenka kagra nagri hankave mani'nenka, fra'ma kisanua hankave kumani'a mani'nane. Kokankonka maka ama mopafima mani'naza vahe'mo'za kagrite e'za amanage hugahaze. Tagehe'zama amage'ma ante'naza anumzaramina tamage anumzana omani'naze. Zamagra amne zanki'za mago'zana huozmante'naze.
